solution_line_template: Originally, the houses are {larger_house_sqft}+{smaller_house_sqft}=<<{larger_house_sqft}+{smaller_house_sqft}={original_total_sqft}>>{original_total_sqft} sq. ft. in total.
The smaller house will be expanded by {new_total_sqft}-{original_total_sqft}=<<{new_total_sqft}-{original_total_sqft}={expansion_amount}>>{expansion_amount} sq. ft.
